title: 服务器崩溃
author: 爱摩羯
txt_content:
服务器开一会之后就会崩溃，但是crosh-repoter里没有日志，从log里找到最新的，请大佬们帮忙看一下

replies.author: 爱摩羯
replies.txt_content: 又出来了崩服日志，是这个Mod DragonMounts is missing the required element 'version' and a version.properties file could not be found. Falling back to metadata version r41-1.7.10

replies.author: 爱摩羯
replies.txt_content:
上面的发错了，应该是这个

replies.author: WZRY
replies.txt_content:
爱摩羯 发表于 2017-8-23 21:34
上面的发错了，应该是这个
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// This doesn't make any sense!
升级一下服务端核心forge

replies.author: Didiao0v0
replies.txt_content:
爱摩羯 发表于 2017-8-23 21:34
上面的发错了，应该是这个
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// This doesn't make any sense!
可能是你Thermos核心版本过低或者不兼容Mod
我建议换成Kc(Kcauldron)
因为你毕竟是Mod服。Kc兼容性比Thermos强
